Welcome to Radical Witch!
Here's how to play:
Press <- on the keyboard to move left
Press -> on the keyboard to move right

You earn points by throwing bombs at enemies.
Try to hit 3 of them!

Your main objective aside from earning points is to stay in
the air for as long as possible. If
you touch the ground, it's game over!
Explosions will launch you up. Attack this enemy while you're close to it to blast-jump!

You may have noticed already, but you don’t
 want to touch enemies directly - as they will stun you.

There’s one more thing to know about: The Dive.
 While you hold down, your falling speed is increased.
 Try it out now.

Sometimes there may be an enemy you need to blast jump on,
 but you can’t reach it in time by falling alone.
Try blast jumping off of this enemy by diving and using your movement keys.

That’s everything you need to know.
 Let’s put those skills to the test.
Earn 50 points to finish the tutorial.
